title: げんしけん: 二代目 The Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture 13
description: Welcome to the world of the Genshiken, home of the true otaku—the Japanese term for ubergeek. This is the story of a group of friends who are members of the most hard-core anime and manga fan club in all of Tokyo—and the boys and girls who love them. Second Season picks up where the previous series left off. Find out what happens when the most otaku of the otaku get together to form the Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture, aka the Genshiken!
author: Shimoku Kio
